message_1:
What is the mean of the following data set? 
{12, 23, 16, 18, 20, 21, 14, 19, 17, 15}
message_2:
To find the mean of a data set, you need to add up all the numbers and then divide by the total number of values in the set. 

For the given data set:
{12, 23, 16, 18, 20, 21, 14, 19, 17, 15}

First, add up all the numbers:
12 + 23 + 16 + 18 + 20 + 21 + 14 + 19 + 17 + 15 = 175

Next, divide the sum by the total number of values (10 in this case):
175 รท 10 = 17.5

So, the mean of the given data set is 17.5.
